text: Ballochia is a genus of plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is endemic to Socotra. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Ballochia amoena Balf.f. * Ballochia atro-virgata Balf.f. * Ballochia rotundifolia Balf.f. Category:Acanthaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Ballochia
